sentence in indonesian using the words: Tono mengangkat tangannya secara ragu-ragu.
english translation: Tono raised his hand hesitantly.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Si Tono datang kesini.
english translation: Mr. Tono came here.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sang raja memerintah dengan bijaksana.
english translation: The king ruled wisely.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sang ratu memakai mahkota indah di kepalanya.
english translation: The queen wore a beautiful crown on her head.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sang pangeran menunggang kuda putih.
english translation: The prince rode a white horse.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sudah sangat lelah, lagi pula cuaca sangat panas.
english translation: He is already very tired, moreover the weather is very hot.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pintu kamar tertutup rapat.
english translation: The room door is tightly closed.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Naskah itu tertulis dalam bahasa Inggris.
english translation: The manuscript is written in English.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku itu terjatuh dari meja.
english translation: The book has fallen from the table.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rencananya sudah ditentukan pada waktu tertentu.
english translation: The plan has been determined at a specific time.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Gelas itu terisi penuh dengan air.
english translation: The glass is filled with water.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku teringat akan masa kecilku.
english translation: I remembered my childhood.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Surat itu telah terkirim kemarin.
english translation: The letter has been sent yesterday.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku-buku itu tersimpan di lemari.
english translation: The books are stored in the cupboard.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Masalah ini terkait dengan topik pembicaraan kita.
english translation: This issue is related to our topic of conversation.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia tidak ingin terlibat dalam perselisihan mereka.
english translation: He doesn't want to get involved in their argument.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memberikan senyum manis kepada tamu-tamu.
english translation: She gave a sweet smile to the guests.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku ini terdiri atas lima bab.
english translation: This book consists of five chapters.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kue ini terdiri dari tepung, gula, dan telur.
english translation: This cake is composed of flour, sugar, and eggs.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong kerjakan pekerjaan ini secepatnya.
english translation: Please do this job as soon as possible.
